name: Sojourn on Mt Tamborine - Hinterland Drive with Spectacular Views!
description: Take it West - Drive up to Mt Tamborine for a spectacular view of the Gold Coast. in the Hinterland. Visit the Botanical Gardens, Gallery Walk with loads of Art Galleries, Restaurants and interesting places. Enjoy lunch at one of many restaurants and cafes. Visit one of the Wineries or take a bush walk,  watch hang gliders take off, enjoy afternoon tea looking out over the vast western view.
